author: novusB
name: OSRSGE
short: Old School RuneScape Grand Exchange price lookup
description: A RedBot cog that fetches and displays Old School RuneScape Grand Exchange prices and trends from the official OSRS API. Features include real-time prices, daily changes, long-term trends, and market insights.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg: Thank you for installing OSRS GE! Use `.ge <item>` to get Grand Exchange prices for any OSRS item.
